title: Replay DownLoad
body: wanna know what files the replays are meant to be coming out as. Cause mine are downloaded into a rofl file?? which cant be played at all. Anyone got insight as to why this is happening?

replies.body:
If you're meaning League's native replays, you can find them under your Documents folder in the **League of Legends** folder. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
as for me, I want to go back and look at them without the client
